Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Spartacist Records TAM 457
0.5 Linear Feet (1 box)
1964-1969
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Materials found in collection; provenance is unknown. The accession number associated with this collection is 1950.202.
Historical/Biographical Note
The International Communist League (Fourth Internationalist), was a Trostkyist international organization based primarily in the United States. The group was led by James Robertson and Tim Wohlforth.
Scope and Contents
This collection contains the minutes of the editorial board of Spartacist.
Conditions Governing Use
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive has no information about copyright ownership for this collection and is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from it. Materials in this collection, which were created in 1964-1969, are expected to enter the public domain in 2105.
